thread.title: Delta airline has close call with drone over JFK
thread.title_full: Delta airline has close call with drone over JFK

author: Melanie Eversley , USA TODAY
title: Delta airline has close call with drone over JFK
text:
An aircraft takes off from New York's John F. Kennedy Airport against a hazy backdrop of the city skyline, May 25, 2015. (Photo: Trevor Collens, AFP/Getty Images)
49 CONNECT 10 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE A Delta airplane traveling from Orlando to New York had a close call with a drone Friday before landing safely.
Flight 407 was arriving from Orlando to New York's John F. Kennedy International Airport when it came about a quarter mile from the drone, Delta told USA TODAY.
The crew was not required to take evasive action and the plane landed safely, according to Delta.
The Federal Aviation Administration is investigating the incident, Delta said.
